name: prankishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves or relates to a prank (= a trick that is intended to be funny but not to cause harm or damage): The two actors had such a good time together that they prankishly played small roles in each other's subsequent films. He decided to prankishly throw a dead mouse at a girl in his class.
More examplesFewer examplesThe groom ended up in the police station, having prankishly stolen several trays of eggs from the back of a delivery van. Prankishly, he added salt to the tea when his parents had guests.
